name: MISSY Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:...Scent Type:...Key Notes:...Fragrance Description:...About the Bottle:...About the Fragrance:.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Organic Alcohol Denat., Allyl Cyclohexyl Propionate, Ambroxan, Anisaldehyde, Appelide, Benzyl Acetate, Benzyl Salicylate Butyl Butyrolactate, Cis-3-Hexenyl Methyl Carbonate, Cyclohexadecenone, Delta Decalactone, Dimethylcyclohexylethoxy Isobutylpropanoate, Ethyl Beta-Naphthyl Ether, Ethyl Hexanoate, Ethyl Hydroxypyrone, Ethyl Linalool, Ethylene Brassylate, Florol, Gamma Octalactone, Gamma Undecalactone, Gamma-Decalactone, Gamma-Nonalactone, Habanolide - Globalide, Heliotropine, Hexyl Acetate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hexyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Isoamyl Acetate, Methyl Anthranilate, Methyl Dihydrojasmonate, Octahydrocoumarin, Orange Terpenes, Oxacycloheptadec-10-En-2-One, P-Anisyl Acetate, Sandalore, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Hold the bottle about eight inches from desired area and spritz your body, neck, wrists and behind knees, also AMAZING in hair. .-Tip: For a longer lasting aroma, in addition to the above, spray lightly over clothing, and avoid rubbing or dabbing as it breaks down the fragrance. .-Apply to well-moisturized skin and reapply every four to six hours for a stronger scent...Recycling Instructions:.-ALL By Rosie Jane packaging is recyclable. ..How to be a cool human: .-Remove pump and sprayer from the bottle, rinse, and throw into your home recycle bin. .-You can return the sprayer and pumps back to By Rosie Jane and they will recycle them for you and also give you a little gift in return.

reviews.review_text: Very similar to OUAI st barts, smells like sunscreen. I don't like it but i don't hate it either. Its wearable, but not my favorite summer scent. I think it's the frangipani that make me not liking it more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice tropical pina colada scent. I love tropical scents and this one definitely smells like a pina colada. I agree with other reviewers that there is a bit of a chemical plasticy type scent, but I still like it. This is definitely not my favorite tropical  perfume, but it's nice to add into my rotation of fragrances. My absolute favorite  tropical beachy coconut fragrance is The 7 Virtues Coconut Sun, and my 2cnd favorite would be Ellis Brooklyn'sMiami Nectar. Both of those are more complex and nuanced in their scent elements. The Missy fragrance is more just a straight pina colada vibe with a bit of a chemical smell, which I don't mind because it does really remind me of a pina colada on the beach . It is nice and lasts for a long time on clothes. It fades pretty quickly in the skin, but if I spray my clothes, I can smell it well into the next day. Overall a nice perfume and my favorite in the By Rosie Jane collection. I also really like their Dulcet fragrance but this one is my favorite in the line.

The main note I smell is coconut with light notes of other tropical fruits and florals. I don't get that much of a sunscreen smell like some other reviews say, mainly just fruit for me. I have some other tropical perfumes that have a strong sunscreen note which I kinda like bc it reminds me of sunbeam (which I love). But there rlly isn't much or any of a sunscreen feel with this. Super excited to bring this with me on vacations and will definitely buy the full size bottle closer to my birthday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this for free to review from By Rosie Jane. The scent is very tropical and coconutty, and it reminds me of hawaiian tropic sunscreen and bath and body works body mists in a similar scent profile. It's not anything unique, but it's a fragrance worth looking into if you're looking for a clean fragrance with a pineapple, coconut, and tropical vibe. Because the tropical scent embodies the summertime and beach vacations, I don't really see myself wearing it outside of those two occasions. There's nothing I dislike about the fragrance, but I will not be purchasing a full bottle nor a travel size because it's not something I gravitate towards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a regular Dulce user, and was lucky enough to get a free sample of the Missy. I don‚Äôt like florals, and prefer sweeter notes, so it can be challenging to find scents that aren‚Äôt too‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt know- ‚Äúimmature‚Äù, I guess? Or cloying? And sometimes the more sophisticated scents in that range are just too sexy for daytime/everyday wear. Missy hits the sweet spot for me as we head into summer.   The first thing that hit me was pineapple, but it quickly mellowed out to a light, fresh scent. It‚Äôs definitely not as sweet as the Dulce, but it gives a little ‚Äútease‚Äù or illusion of sweetness, in my opinion- kind of like the hint of fruit flavor in a sparkling water.  My husband commented on how good I smelled, and actually noticed I was wearing something different, which is not always the case. I will definitely be purchasing the full sized bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like your skin soaked up the atmosphere on a tropical vacay

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a dabber sample of Rosie Jane's new fragrance to try. This is a lovely summer scent without being an in your face sunscreen scent. If you are familiar with other Rosie Jane perfumes, then I would say this smells like Rosie and Madie had a baby. Missy wears close to the body. She is definitely a scent to be discovered and does not announce her presence. I find that the scent fades from my skin in about 3 hours, but lasts on clothing about twice that. I have ordered a travel size to enjoy over the next few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big By Rosie Jane fan and was excited to be asked to sample their new fragrance Missy. Normally, beachy scents aren't my thing. I thought things would be the same when first spraying this one. It is floral and fruity and definitely has a tropical kind of vibe. Imagine a flower tucked behind a tan-kissed ear, while enjoying a gorgeous island vacation. Missy has a more refined, lush feel, especially as it dried down. It's been about 10 hours since the original application and Missy still lingers faintly. So if you need a break from this endless winter and a reminder of what summer might smell like, give Missy a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Discover pure delight and refreshing clarity in this tropical perfume. Its unique blend of exotic fruits and florals evokes a sense of sunny beach days and carefree moments.  intimacy reminiscent of a blissful day spent on a tropical beach.  The fragrance unfurls with the enchanting aroma of frangipani, infusing the air with its sweet floral notes that transport you to lush, sun-drenched landscapes. As the scent evolves, the tantalizing blend of pineapple and toasted coconut emerges, adding a delightful touch of tropical paradise to your senses.  Hints of green mandarin lend a vibrant energy to the composition, awakening your spirit and inspiring a sense of invigorating clarity. Each inhalation is a celebration of life's simple pleasures, filling you with a radiant positivity that uplifts your mood and brightens your day.  Wrapped in this enchanting fragrance, you'll find yourself surrounded by an aura of happiness and contentment, as if every moment is infused with the magic of summer days and carefree adventures. Embrace the joyfulness that this perfume brings and let its luminous spirit accompany you wherever you go.  TL;dr - It smells like Summer.
Received this as a sample and i love it so much more than i thought i would it‚Äôs a perfect summer scent!!

I‚Äôve been neutral about it. But last night I received SO many compliments. And I took a moment to smell my wrist and it had developed into this really gorgeous, playful scent. So feminine and just lovely.   So I might be a convert‚Ä¶ stay tuned xo

reviews.review_text: I couldn't wait to try this fragrance and it did not disappoint. I wasn't sure what to expect with this fragrance, even with the description, but it does make me look forward to summer a little. I can smell the coconut, but not too much. And the frangipani comes through beautifully with its lovely floral scent. A really pretty sweet, floral scent I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite scent from by/rosie jane is Dulce. I like woody/gourmand scents. I received a free sample of Missy and had no idea what to expect. It's pleasant and summery and is surprisingly long-lasting. It's nothing like Madie which is more of an ocean scent while Missy is fruity/tropical. I like it enough to finish the sample, but It's probably not something I would buy. It is I would say a nice blend of scents (coconut, pineapple, mandarin, frangipani), and if you like tropical scents, it's certainly worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Rosie Jane scents and couldn't wait to try Missy! It really does smell like summer and I think it will appeal to a broad range of tastes. It's a bit floral, a bit fruity, and a bit sweet. It reminds me of an island vacation. I'm not a big floral fan, and for me the floral was a bit overpowering when I first applied Missy. But it very quickly dried into a beautiful scent and I found that I couldn't stop smelling my wrists! I think my favorites are still Lake and Dulce, but I'm very excited to put Missy into my summer rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Summer 2024, this is your scent! It‚Äôs reminiscent of youthful summers but with notes that elevate. You‚Äôll want this perfume on hand for all of your summer events!

reviews.review_text: This is a heady tropical floral. If you want to smell like night flowers on a tropical island, this is the perfume for you. Long lasting and I like how there is no toxic ingredients to interfere with my asthma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Missy smells like girly summer days. Fruity, floral, and sunshine at the beach. Definitely a warm weather scent. I received a sample for By Rosie Jane. My favorite from their line is still Lake, followed by Dulce. I would recommend Missy if you like the floral/slightly fruity/summer vibe. But if she‚Äôs not for you, I would still recommend checking out the brand‚Äôs other scents, they have a wide variety and something for everyone‚Äôs tastes.

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm a long time fan of By Rose Jane. I‚Äôve worn their scent ‚ÄúRosie‚Äù for years- in the spray bottle, oil roller and body wash form.   I‚Äôm sensitive to fragrance, but I like soft and clean scents and I appreciate that BRJ uses transparent clean ingredients and is woman-owned.    I purchased the discovery set a few years ago and enjoyed all the scents. James was the only one that gave me a slight headache.   I‚Äôve purchased and (now returned) their two newest scents- Dulce and Missy and sadly did not like either :(   I found them both cloying and wanted to wash them off immediately. Maybe sweet and/or fruity scents are just not my thing?   The day after I sprayed 1 spritz of Missy, my family members said they could still taste it in the air. :p I guess this could be a good thing if you like the scent and want it to be long lasting.  Would love to see BRJ do more ‚ÄúRosie‚Äù adjacent scents.

reviews.review_text: I am loving the new Missy! It is a subtle mix of my favorite scents. It will definitely be in my daily rotation along with Dulce and Rosie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this fragrance as part of a promotion -- here is my honest critique. Missy is a light, playful scent that hits with a predominant note of coconut. The frangipani takes the edge off the fruity notes so you don't feel like you are wearing a salad. It dries down quickly to a soft, friendly embrace that would work well for a casual day.  It's not overpowering or cloying like many sweet/gourmand fragrances can be. Overall, it's something I would add to my gym/hanging out/brunch rotation.

reviews.review_title: A must have for my travels
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this scent, it's juicy and sweet, I have been getting a lot of compliments. Definitely for summer time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this one. I received it today & it‚Äôs a fruity but fresh fragrance. Perfect for summer. Tracy F

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received a sample of Missy in the mail. Missy is a beautiful scent, but not unfamiliar. When first sprayed I get whiffs of pineapple and frangipani. Once dried down, I mostly get solar notes. When compared to my favorite By Rosie Jane scent, Dulce, the sillage could be better. With that said, this is still a solid scent for the summer and I will be using it on my next vacation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample in the mail and was very pleasantly surprised that I loved it. My go to by rosiejane has always been Rosie, hands down, but this new Missy scent is most definitely a contender. The scent of sensual sweetness takes you back to peaceful memories. Received plenty of compliments from all ages, even my teen. The undertones of toasted coconut get better with time and lasts all day long. As you walk by people, get used to the subtle compliment of the inquiry‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúIs that you, that smells so good?‚Äù  : )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a small sample of Missy in the mail to try and so far I love it! It's a very springy/summery scent-- sweet, light, and a little bit sugary. It smells so good I almost want to eat it. It's very tropical but also different and more complex than your standard pina colada scents. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Certain scents in perfumes don't mix well with my body chemistry and give me a terrible headache. Something in this perfume, maybe the pineapple, is triggering me. It does have a nice floral/fruity scent, but I'll have to stick with my favorite Rosie Jane scent for now and give this one a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely fresh fragrance. Not overly anything,....just a beautiful fresh scent, which I really like. If they were going for a day at the beach drinking Pina coladas with my girlfriends....they nailed it! Staying power was pretty good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely brings summer to mind! It‚Äôs airy and fresh and a great addition to spring and summer scents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleasant tropical scent that reminds me of summer with a very light floral note in there. My mother and daughter also enjoyed it. I‚Äôve tried multiple by this company and they‚Äôre all nice but this one will be one of my go-to‚Äôs along with dulce.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Rosie Jane products!!! They‚Äôre always so light and fresh and Missy brings summer vibes! Smells very beachy and natural with a little bit of a lavish and luxury smell too. Definitely my new summer scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this to try from By Rosie Jane. I have been a loyal user of their products for over a year now and I absolutely love this scent. It's the perfect spring/summer floral scent. I will absolutely be buying a full bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

Missy is sweet and refreshing but it's giving major Coconut Lime Verbena from Bath & Body works. Don't get me wrong, that was my FAVORITE scent from B&BW but it did cause some deja vu.   Maybe I'll try the oil of this scent if there's a discount and I see good reviews about it's staying power.
This is a very clean smell.  Imagine lounging on freshly laundered cotton sheet spread out in a sunny field of flowers.  Clean and sunny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: here‚Äôs my thoughts on it.personally absolutely I‚Äôm obsessed with this. I will be buying the full bottle immediately. If you like sun tan lotion mixed with fruity notes that‚Äôs note overboard this is the one. Ôøº

reviews.review_text: Received a sample in the mail.  I tend to prefer sweet or floral scents, this was the perfect combination of the two.  I applied a bit to my wrists and could smell the perfume throughout the day.  It's light and fresh, not overwhelming.
I love all the products from By Rosie Jane and this is no exception! It's a luscious, beautiful scent that puts a smile on my face and makes me think of sun, best friends, and good times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small vial sample from BRJ to try. This could easily be a year round scent. I definitely smell Jasmin and a hint of coconut. I like this and will consider purchasing a bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and was so excited to try it! I love the perfumes from by/ Rosie Jane and this may be a new favorite! I LOVE this one! It is fresh and floraly! I will definitely be buying this one!

reviews.review_title: Can't wait to buy a full size!

reviews.review_text: I've just returned to cold, windy Vermont from Florida and was feeling miserable until I tried this fragrance. It's beaches and tropics and oceans in a bottle and an instant mood brightener. Definitely my happy place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fragrance! Smells like nostalgia - of beaches and summer vacations. Sweet and a little fruity, without overwhelming. Lasts a few hours on the skin and plays nicely with other soft floral fragrances for layering ü©∑

reviews.review_text: The drydown on this is absolutely lovely, but I'm not a huge fan of the way the middle & top notes mesh together. On me, the green mandarin dominates & pushes everything else aside. This also gives it a sharp, vaguely masculine edge I wasn't expecting.  The toasted coconut note, which appears next, has a dry, almost plastic quality I've found in some (but not all) coconut scents from indie or natural brands. It isn't really sweet or creamy until it settles into the drydown, with the pineapple & ambroxan.  Overall, I enjoyed Missy & definitely recommend sampling if you're a fan of summer scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample in exchange for a review. This is a fantastic summer time scent. I wish it had lasted longer than the 3 hours anyone could smell it on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate enough to get the lab sample and i immediately love!! takes me to a tropical paradise. this will be the summer fragrance of 2024 and the longevity is amazing compare to other Rosie fragrances! Will definitely be picking up a full bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky to received a sample from Rosie Jane. This smells so good, not over powering, very fresh! It‚Äôs a great summer scent. Stays on well too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Missy has arrived on the scene just in time for warm weather, sunscreen, and long overdue adventures. Her most prominent note for me is the coconut which gives way gracefully to pineapple shortly after. Keeping those fruit-forward notes airy and afloat is tropical flower frangipani.   Missy is a sweeter scent compared to most of byRosieJane‚Äôs catalog and out of personal preference, I don‚Äôt usually find myself reaching for sweet fragrances. However, this perfume makes me feel undeniably happy. It transports me back to my high school days when I would visit the beach with my best friend. When I smell this scent, I see us wrapped in a sandy, girlish embrace laughing maniacally at something that wasn‚Äôt that funny.. and in this moment, Missy is what my best friend smells like to me. Missy is pure, carefree summertime girlhood.   All that to say, while this is not a perfume I personally might reach for, it is one that I would be thrilled to smell on someone else. There‚Äôs something so feminine, joyful, and nostalgic about it that I find truly enchanting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent a sample in the mail as I‚Äôm a huge Rosie Jane scent fan; this did not disappoint. It‚Äôs fresh and sweet and slightly addicting. I will be purchasing when it‚Äôs back in stock !!

reviews.review_title: Get it if you like coconut!

My favorite scent is Rosie and I like a few of the other scents but this scent isn‚Äôt my typical scent bc I‚Äôm not really a fan of coconut in perfumes so that‚Äôs why I gave it three stars. It is as quality as the other scents and just as cute in the glass bottle and still clean, but the scent just isn‚Äôt my typical scent

reviews.review_text: This is a very fruity floral sunscreen type of smell. I‚Äôm grateful I got to try it out but had I known it was coconut, I would have passed. reviews.review_title: Rosie is a lovely summery scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

If you like beach scents that lean sunscreen-y, you‚Äôll really love this new scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like the other fragrances from this brand, Missy is a fresh and delicious scent that makes you feel nice. It leans toward sweet and fruity. Perfect for weekends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so grateful to have gotten a sample of this. It is divine. The brand never misses with their fragrances. It‚Äôs such a delicate flowery and sweet smell. Would be great in spring and summer!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Missy is a beautiful tropical and floral coconut scent. Immediately, you get whiffs of coconut, but not just your standard coconut. It‚Äôs the type of coconut where pineapple, coconut, and light frangipani florals meet. It‚Äôs definitely sweet, but it‚Äôs light. It‚Äôs stunning and instantly gives me a good vibe. My only issue is the staying power. I dabbed it on my pulse points this morning and it‚Äôs undetectable on my wrists. Now this could be that it did fade, or it could be I am nose blind. However, I can still smell it where I placed it on my decolletege. However, this is a clean fragrance brand and clean fragrance brands are known to fade quicker. I feel going in with the mindset that this happens, helps with understanding it. I am at the 4 hour mark and can smell it on the parts mentioned above. That being said, I can see this being an absolutely incredible summer scent and that‚Äôs exactly the purpose it will be for me. I‚Äôm excited to get my hands on it. Definitely recommend!
I feel like I‚Äôm wearing summer when I put this on! It is oil based so you do have to wait for it to blend in. But I always feel more confident when I wear perfume from Rosie Jane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this scent. Sweet floral coconut. True to Rosie Jane their scent lasts and it‚Äôs not overpowering which is good because I really can‚Äôt do the super strong scents anymore since I have gotten older. I like the lighter side of scents but they need to last. Usually the beach vibe scents tend to be too strong for me but this one I quite enjoy. My boyfriend likes the smell as well and he usually isn‚Äôt one to say anything lol. Usually I purchase their oil base perfume because they tend to not be so strong but strong enough to last. This was scent to me in a trial bottle for an honest review. I would purchase this though. So far I enjoy Rosie Jane perfumes and I was not let down yet. Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

If you are looking for a fragrance that enters the room before you and hangs around 5 minutes after you leave this is probably not the one for you! But if you want something that floats with you without being overpowering this is lovely!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice. Great for summer, reminds me very much of the bath and body hair care at the beach. So I pulled out my at the beach products and compared, yes they are very similar. Missy is a bit sweeter though. I will be purchasing a full size bottle asap! Layering all of them together will be great! I was sent a sample by Rosie Jane, thank you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE Rosie Jane. I‚Äôm currently obsessed with their Rosie sent, literally can‚Äôt get enough of it. Got the new Missy sent in the mail and it genuinely smells like summer. I love it, it reminds me of laying out by a pool on a sunny day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Very different than Madie--you get the coconut and pineapple up front and then it mellows to the bright floral notes. As with all of Rosie Jane fragrances, they're natural, so carry the travel size with you to refresh throughout the day.

I‚Äôve used Missy for about a week now - it‚Äôs a very bright scent that feels very summery with the pineapple in it.  I tend to like warmer scents - my favorite is James, but this is a fun alternative for a sunny day by the lake or beach!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just received my free sample and I really like it!!! It reminds me of a summery beachy feel.  It lasted all day and I got a lot of compliments üòå......I love this line of scents! They are so clean and light. I totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample of missy love this I will be purchasing a full size bottle you definitely smell the coconut and pineapple which I love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By Rosie Jane makes all of my favorite perfumes, and Missy does not disappoint! It‚Äôs beachy, but completely different from her Madie scent; fruity and coconutty and full of life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really good but definitely smells floral fresh and young.

My first impression was the very strong coconut and fruit small, much too strong and sweet for my liking. The scent does seem to fade quickly and within an hour I couldn‚Äôt smell anything. reviews.review_title: Missy will be nice for spring/summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Dry skin

I am not a fan of the really sunscreen smelling perfumes and would not say this one is smells like that. It‚Äôs coconut with a hint of floral, which is a nice balance. I am partial to Rosie and Leila Lou so I gave it four stars as those would be a five but I would recommend it if you like the scent it is described as because the description is accurate.

reviews.review_title: Young a sweet but not for me :)
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of Missy in exchange for my honest review. I definitely get a lot of coconut and it reads very young - not necessarily a bad thing but I prefer slightly edgier fragrances at this stage of my life. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful fragrance, an easy everyday reach. Love the hint of coconut. New spring and summer fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like a day lounging on a tropical beach. On first whiff, my skin automatically picked up on the fruity top notes of mandarin and pineapple. I'm also pleased to report that at age 62 I don't feel as if the scent is too young for me. There is a touch of something (amber?) that comes through after a couple of hours of wearing that takes the scent from bright and sunny to a more stabilizing long term just smells fresh and clean- like after a rain storm with the sun shyly peaking out of its cloud bed.  We all know a Missy that this perfume completely personifies. I know what my next present to my Missy is!

reviews.review_text: My personal go-to is Leila Lou. I swear it‚Äôs my perfect scent. I got this as a free sample, but I would buy this again and again and again. This smell is the most perfect encapsulation of what is summertime. It smells like warm days on the beach or by the pool, getting ready for dinner, and pure relaxation. I cannot WAIT to buy the oil of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first it reminded me of BBW Secret Wonderland  , but after letting it settle a few days the notes really came out to play! Instant throwback to the Ebba Miss Marisa perfume oils of my youth. MISSY is a sweet tropical smoothie-inspired medium-light daytime fragrance with great staying power. She is fun, young, and barefoot. Wear her if playful sunny spring/summer scents are the vibe you seek! You can also layer her to smell more delicious: Versace Crystal Noir, Mugler Alien Goddess Intense (creates a cool coconut incense), Nette Coco Fleur (pretty and woody together.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so good and will be a great summer scent!  I can smell the pineapple & coconut. My favorite By Rosie Jane scent is Rosie but this one is #2.

reviews.review_title: Beachy but not junior high girl beachy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am astonishingly surprised that I like this. I do not love the smell of fruity or coconut because it reminds me of nasty bath and body works. This is NOT THAT. It is fruity, but not in a headache kind of way. It‚Äôs more fresh and reminds me of seriously being on a Jamaican resort. The smell instantly makes me happy especially knowing that BRJ is cruelty free. I have been buying from Rosie Jane for about 3-4 years now and own Rosie (my personal favorite and my most complimented scent), James, and Dylan are my favorites. I also own their body milks, perfume oils, and shower wash. No, they didn‚Äôt pay me to write this review. I just adore fresh scents and it‚Äôs so hard for me to find scents that don‚Äôt give me headaches and I have found a company I love and stick with it. Keep up the good work !!!

I received a sample from By Rosie Jane and have been using it the past few days. If you love beachy, coconutty, vacation scents, this is for you. This is the first scent I have tried from them and will definitely be purchasing the full size.

I received a sample of this in the mail. I absolutely love the fragrance.  It is comforting and not overwhelming at all.  It smells like a vacation. I will buy the full size when it's available!!
